item.description:
While Andala is not Brazilian/Portuguese it is a great spot near Central with plenty of room for a big group (downstairs).

For those learning Portuguese I would recommend that you bring notebooks, dictionaries, or reading material to use during the meeting to make the most of your time. Come with questions and a willingness to dive in and speak a little Portuguese!

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Lazy Sundays - Learn & practice Portuguese
